name: Shawn Johnson Gymnastics
description: Go for the gold with Shawn Johnson as you compete in the world of competitive gymnastics! Stick your landings on vault and nail your combinations on beam to impress the judges, or you could risk your shot at a medal! Start as an amateur and work your way up, earning awards on your way to the World Championships. Train diligently in practice and you’ll be ready to take on competitions in no time! Earn your way through bronze, silver and gold medals as you evolve into an all-around star in the world of gymnastics. Perfect the routines and score high marks to earn a place on the podium and in the hearts of your fans.
